data.textUthmani: يَقْدُمُ قَوْمَهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَأَوْرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْوِرْدُ ٱلْمَوْرُودُ
data.wordByWord: يَقْدُمُ [He will precede] قَوْمَهُۥ [his people] يَوْمَ [(on the) Day] ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ [(of) the Resurrection] فَأَوْرَدَهُمُ [and lead them] ٱلنَّارَ ۖ [(into) the Fire] وَبِئْسَ [And wretched] ٱلْوِرْدُ [(is) the place] ٱلْمَوْرُودُ [to which (they are) led]
data.transliteration: Yaqdumu qawmahu yawma alqiyamatifaawradahumu annara wabi/sa alwirdu almawrood

data.textUthmani: وَأُتْبِعُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِۦ لَعْنَةً وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ بِئْسَ ٱلرِّفْدُ ٱلْمَرْفُودُ
data.wordByWord: وَأُتْبِعُوا۟ [And they were followed] فِى [in] هَـٰذِهِۦ [this] لَعْنَةًۭ [(by) a curse] وَيَوْمَ [and (on the) Day] ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ [(of) the Resurrection] بِئْسَ [Wretched] ٱلرِّفْدُ [(is) the gift] ٱلْمَرْفُودُ [which (will) be given]
data.transliteration: WaotbiAAoo fee hathihi laAAnatanwayawma alqiyamati bi/sa arrifdu almarfood

data.textUthmani: ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلْقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيْكَ ۖ مِنْهَا قَآئِمٌ وَحَصِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: ذَٰلِكَ [That] مِنْ [(is) from] أَنۢبَآءِ [(the) news] ٱلْقُرَىٰ [(of) the cities] نَقُصُّهُۥ [(which) We relate] عَلَيْكَ ۖ [to you] مِنْهَا [of them] قَآئِمٌۭ [some are standing] وَحَصِيدٌۭ [and (some) mown]
data.transliteration: Thalika min anba-i alquranaqussuhu AAalayka minha qa-imun wahaseed

data.textUthmani: وَمَا ظَلَمْنَـٰهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ ۖ فَمَآ أَغْنَتْ عَنْهُمْ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ ٱلَّتِى يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَىْءٍ لَّمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَمَا زَادُوهُمْ غَيْرَ تَتْبِيبٍ
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] ظَلَمْنَـٰهُمْ [We wronged them] وَلَـٰكِن [but] ظَلَمُوٓا۟ [they wronged] أَنفُسَهُمْ ۖ [themselves] فَمَآ [So not] أَغْنَتْ [availed] عَنْهُمْ [them] ءَالِهَتُهُمُ [their gods] ٱلَّتِى [which] يَدْعُونَ [they invoked] مِن [other than Allah] دُونِ [other than Allah] ٱللَّهِ [other than Allah] مِن [any] شَىْءٍۢ [thing] لَّمَّا [when] جَآءَ [came] أَمْرُ [(the) command (of) your Lord] رَبِّكَ ۖ [(the) command (of) your Lord] وَمَا [And not] زَادُوهُمْ [they increased them] غَيْرَ [other than] تَتْبِيبٍۢ [ruin]
data.transliteration: Wama thalamnahumwalakin thalamoo anfusahum famaaghnat AAanhum alihatuhumu allatee yadAAoona min dooni Allahimin shay-in lamma jaa amru rabbika wama zadoohumghayra tatbeeb

data.textUthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَخْذُ رَبِّكَ إِذَآ أَخَذَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ وَهِىَ ظَـٰلِمَةٌ ۚ إِنَّ أَخْذَهُۥٓ أَلِيمٌ شَدِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: وَكَذَٰلِكَ [And thus] أَخْذُ [(is) the seizure (of) your Lord] رَبِّكَ [(is) the seizure (of) your Lord] إِذَآ [when] أَخَذَ [He seizes] ٱلْقُرَىٰ [the cities] وَهِىَ [while they] ظَـٰلِمَةٌ ۚ [(are) doing wrong] إِنَّ [Indeed] أَخْذَهُۥٓ [His seizure] أَلِيمٌۭ [(is) painful] شَدِيدٌ [(and) severe]
data.transliteration: Wakathalika akhthu rabbika ithaakhatha alqura wahiya thalimatuninna akhthahu aleemun shadeed

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّمَنْ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمٌ مَّجْمُوعٌ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمٌ مَّشْهُودٌ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] فِى [in] ذَٰلِكَ [that] لَـَٔايَةًۭ [(is) surely a Sign] لِّمَنْ [for (those) who] خَافَ [fear] عَذَابَ [(the) punishment] ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ [(of) the Hereafter] ذَٰلِكَ [That] يَوْمٌۭ [(is) a Day] مَّجْمُوعٌۭ [(will) be gathered] لَّهُ [on it] ٱلنَّاسُ [the mankind] وَذَٰلِكَ [and that] يَوْمٌۭ [(is) a Day] مَّشْهُودٌۭ [witnessed]
data.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laayatanliman khafa AAathaba al-akhirati thalikayawmun majmooAAun lahu annasu wathalikayawmun mashhoodun

data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] نُؤَخِّرُهُۥٓ [We delay it] إِلَّا [except] لِأَجَلٍۢ [for a term] مَّعْدُودٍۢ [limited]

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ يَأْتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِۦ ۚ فَمِنْهُمْ شَقِىٌّ وَسَعِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] يَأْتِ [(it) comes] لَا [not] تَكَلَّمُ [will speak] نَفْسٌ [a soul] إِلَّا [except] بِإِذْنِهِۦ ۚ [by His leave] فَمِنْهُمْ [Then among them] شَقِىٌّۭ [(will be the) wretched] وَسَعِيدٌۭ [and (the) glad]
data.transliteration: Yawma ya/ti la takallamu nafsun illabi-ithnihi faminhum shaqiyyun wasaAAeed

data.textUthmani: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُوا۟ فَفِى ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمْ فِيهَا زَفِيرٌ وَشَهِيقٌ
data.wordByWord: فَأَمَّا [As for] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] شَقُوا۟ [were wretched] فَفِى [then (they will be) in] ٱلنَّارِ [the Fire] لَهُمْ [For them] فِيهَا [therein] زَفِيرٌۭ [(is) sighing] وَشَهِيقٌ [and wailing]
data.transliteration: Faamma allatheena shaqoofafee annari lahum feeha zafeerun washaheeq

data.textUthmani: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
data.wordByWord: خَـٰلِدِينَ [(Will be) abiding] فِيهَا [therein] مَا [as long as remain] دَامَتِ [as long as remain] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضُ [and the earth] إِلَّا [except] مَا [what your Lord wills] شَآءَ [what your Lord wills] رَبُّكَ ۚ [what your Lord wills] إِنَّ [Indeed] رَبَّكَ [your Lord] فَعَّالٌۭ [(is) All-Accomplisher] لِّمَا [of what] يُرِيدُ [He intends]
data.transliteration: Khalideena feeha ma damatiassamawatu wal-ardu illama shaa rabbuka inna rabbaka faAAAAalun limayureed

data.textUthmani: ۞ وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ سُعِدُوا۟ فَفِى ٱلْجَنَّةِ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَ ۖ عَطَآءً غَيْرَ مَجْذُوذٍ
data.wordByWord: ۞ وَأَمَّا [And as for] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] سُعِدُوا۟ [were glad] فَفِى [then (they will be) in] ٱلْجَنَّةِ [Paradise] خَـٰلِدِينَ [(will be) abiding] فِيهَا [therein] مَا [as long as remains] دَامَتِ [as long as remains] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضُ [and the earth] إِلَّا [except] مَا [what your Lord wills ] شَآءَ [what your Lord wills ] رَبُّكَ ۖ [what your Lord wills ] عَطَآءً [a bestowal] غَيْرَ [not] مَجْذُوذٍۢ [interrupted]
data.transliteration: Waamma allatheena suAAidoofafee aljannati khalideena feeha ma damatiassamawatu wal-ardu illama shaa rabbuka AAataan ghayra majthooth
